Contents: RT @UCBerkeley Nicknamed the “replicator” by the inventors — after the #StarTrek device that can materialize any object on demand — the new #3Dprinter can create objects that are smoother, more flexible & more complex than what is possible w/traditional 3D printers. #BerkeleyResearch 💡👁️ 😮 https://t.co/XJQToibXS9
